---
category: news
title: "AWS Introduces the Event Replay and Archive Capability in Its Eventbridge Service"
excerpt: "Amazon EventBridge is a serverless event bus that delivers a stream of real-time data from event sources and routes that data to targets like AWS Lambda. Recently, AWS introduced an event replay and archive capability - providing developers a way to replay past events and extend their applications with new functionality."
